oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Artist in Residence - Jason Isbell - 2017-12-19
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Third of three Artist in Residence performances by Jason Isbell from the CMA Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on December 19, 2017. Accompanied by Amanda Shires. Special guests include Mac McAnally, Jerry Douglas, Buddy Miller, Emmylou Harris, Gillian Welch and David Rawlings. Audio restricted. Contact for access.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jason Isbell; Amanda Shires; Mac McAnally; Jerry Douglas; Buddy Miller; Emmylou Harris; Gillian Welch; David Rawlings;
